body_html: It seems the unrolling should only be necessary for the training process. At inference-time, it should function on a sample-by-sample basis. But I guess it is just a memory vs speed trade-off question.
body_text: It seems the unrolling should only be necessary for the training process.  At inference-time, it should function on a sample-by-sample basis.  But I guess it is just a memory vs speed trade-off question.
body: It seems the unrolling should only be necessary for the training process.  At inference-time, it should function on a sample-by-sample basis.  But I guess it is just a memory vs speed trade-off question.
